Grow your business on Instagram: 在 Instagram 上扩展您的业务
\nTo Obtain the following credentials:\n:
To Obtain the following credentials:
1. Visit https://developers.facebook.com/
2. Create an application, Select Other for Usecase.
3. Select Business as App Type.
4. Copy App Id and App Secret from Basic Settings.
Upload a photo to an Instagram Professio: 上传照片到 Instagram 专业帐户
Upload a reel to an Instagram Profession: 上传reel 到 Instagram 专业帐户
Caption: 标题
